pages.text: The Vicious Claw is a $(d)Super Trinket$() which inherits the abilities of its base form, as well as a 1.5x increase to the player's pseudo-melee damage. However, in exchange, the player takes 1.25x damage from ALL sources.$(br)Pseudo-melee damage is any damage which is not fire damage, magic damage, explosions, or projectiles.
